parameter.name: invoiceId
parameter.description: The identifier of the invoice to be updated.

parameter.name: applicationFee
parameter.description: the amount to be applied to the invoice and transferred to the application owner’s Stripe account.

parameter.name: statementDescription
parameter.description: Extra information about a charge for the customer’s credit card statement.

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: A set of key/value pairs that you can attach to a refund object.

parameter.name: closed
parameter.description: Boolean representing whether an invoice is closed or not.

parameter.name: forgiven
parameter.description: Boolean representing whether an invoice is forgiven or not.
